mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket(ticket_id, ticket_name, ticket_period, ticket_price, ticket_status, ticket_recommend) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(ticket_id), 0) + 1 FROM ticket), #{ticketName}, #{ticketPeriod}, #{ticketPrice}, #{ticketStatus}, #{ticketRecommend} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ticket ORDER BY ticket_period DESC ) T ) ORDER BY RNUM DESC
